content: Hi! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava and I’m here to help you get scheduled. Can I please have your name to start?
I'm not sure I want to give you my name yet.
No worries at all! We can move forward without your name for now. Could you tell me what plumbing issue you’re experiencing, so I can assist you?
It’s complicated and I don’t even know if you’ll actually help, or if the person who comes out will make it any better.

I completely understand your concern. Our technicians are experienced and we do our best to resolve every issue. Are you able to give a brief description of the problem, or would you prefer to speak with a human representative directly?
If I give you my address, are you even going to send someone on time? Last three places I called didn’t even call me back.

I’m sorry to hear about your past experiences. We pride ourselves on reliability and will keep you updated every step of the way. If you’d like, I can check our earliest availability before taking any more of your details.
What’s the point if you can’t guarantee a specific time? And if it’s just another window, that isn’t really helpful.

We do provide arrival windows in order to account for possible delays, but we always try our best to arrive within the scheduled time. Would you like to see the soonest window we currently have available, or is there a particular day and time that would work better for you?
I just want to know if I’ll even get a price before someone comes out, because I don’t want to get surprised like last time.

We can provide a general estimate, but for many plumbing issues, an in-person assessment is needed for accuracy. Would you like a ballpark estimate or prefer to have a technician evaluate the issue first?
See, that’s what I mean. I never get a straight answer. This is always a runaround. I’ll think about it, but probably not.
reason: Customer unwilling to proceed after multiple attempts
